data.description:
Maquis characters have a knack for assembling and repairing technology using whatever materials are at hand.

Three times per day, a Maquis fighter may attempt to cobble together a mechanical device (pistol, radio, etc.) from spare parts, subject to the Referee’s approval. This item lasts for 2d6 rounds or 2d6 uses (whichever is more appropriate) before falling apart.
